cars.description: This is a demo 2015 Nissan GT-R with only 200 miles on it. Leather seats, power everything.
This is an immaculate 1997 Porsche 911 with only 47,000 miles on it. Leather seats, power everything.
This is an well kept 1997 Toyota Supra with only 29,810 miles on it. Turbo! Turbo! Turbo!
This is a restored numbers matching 1970 Hemi Cuda convertable with 1,500 miles on it. Dual Quad 426/425 HP Hemi V-8 engine
This is an limited build 2005 Ford GT with only 500 miles on it. Heritage Edition is the rarest of rare.
